fullText: Franco brings movie-star magnetism to the role of George, the protector of his simple-minded companion Lennie, played with touching vulnerability by Chris O'Dowd.
dtliExcerpt: Franco brings movie-star magnetism to the role of George, the protector of his simple-minded companion Lennie, played with touching vulnerability by Chris O'Dowd.
